Description: One fragment of an ear-ring made of red jasper with a half circular section, very well polished at the outside, the fine drill lines are visible in the inside. One flattened sphere bead made of faience, no glaze preserved.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2X, medium levels
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
